step_zh: 旋开储气瓶导管上的活塞，排出一氧化碳
step_en: Open the piston on the gas cylinder's conduit to release carbon monoxide
clip_video_path: /path/to/chemistry/ch_67/video/02-一氧化碳的燃烧/02-一氧化碳的燃烧_step_2.mp4
subject: chemistry

annotations.text_en: Turn the valve of this gas cylinder
annotations.safety_en: Confirm no open flames in the vicinity before operation. Use explosion-proof tools to slowly open the valve.
annotations.safety_zh: 操作前需确认周边无明火，使用防爆工具缓慢开启阀门

annotations.text: 导管上的活塞排出一氧化碳
annotations.text_en: The piston on the conduit releases carbon monoxide
annotations.safety_en: Control the gas flow rate and ensure the laboratory's forced ventilation system remains operational.
annotations.safety_zh: 需控制气体流速，保持实验室强制通风系统开启
